description.en:
Sent to live in the country with her grandmother after her parents’ separation, young girl Miyori spends most of her time daydreaming to escape her harsh reality. When she sets foot into her new home’s nearby forest, she encounters a series of curiosities: a tree struck by lightning, but still yielding new blossoms; the inexplicable appearance of a tiger–could this be a forest of spirits?

In the Miyori no Mori series:
1. Miyori no Mori
2. Miyori no Mori no Shiki
3. Zoku Miyori no Mori no Shiki

The first volume was published in 2004, and two sequels in 2007 and 2008.
